laboratory_examinations.findings: White cell count: 13,000/µL (82% neutrophils), Hematocrit: 46%, Platelet count: 31,000/µL. Peripheral smear showed 3 to 5 schistocytes and scattered nucleated red blood cells per high-powered field.
Creatinine: 1.15 mg/dL; Blood urea nitrogen: 28 mg/dL; Serum electrolytes: normal.

Aspartate aminotransferase: 88 U/L (normal range: 16–41); Alanine aminotransferase: 117 U/L (normal range: 11–54); Total bilirubin: 1.8 mg/dL (normal range: 0.3–1.9); Alkaline phosphatase: 116 IU/L (normal range: 20–140); Lactate dehydrogenase: 425 IU/L (normal range: 91–185).
Partial thromboplastin time: 29 seconds; International normalized ratio: 1.3.
Mean right atrial pressure: 9 mm Hg; RV systolic pressure: 75 mm Hg; Pulmonary artery pressure: 75/37 mm Hg (mean: 49 mm Hg); Mean pulmonary capillary wedge pressure: 35 mm Hg.
